skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: Proficient in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript (React.js), with a strong emphasis on creating responsive and accessible user interfaces.

skills.title: JavaScript
skills.description: Knowledge of JavaScript core concepts involves understanding the foundational principles and features of the language that form the basis for building any JavaScript application.

skills.title: Git/Github
skills.description: Knowledge of version control system that allows multiple developers to track changes in source code during software development and cloud-based platform that hosts Git repositories and provides tools for collaboration, version control, and project management.
